relationSignature: msgSenderInconsistency_Detector(c1: id, f1: id, e1: id, c2: id, f2: id, e2: id)

description.head: Inconsistent use of msg.sender and _msgSender
description.tail: msg.sender is used in ${c1.name}.{f1.name} at ${e1.src} while _msgSender() is used in ${c2.name}.${f2.name} at ${e2.src}
